name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Leaptons: Shopping Price Compare, Best Deals

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find lowest price automatically, save money and save time.
short.zh_CN: 北美全网自动比价，识别虚假Deal

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Leaptons compares price automatically across the web. Leaptons finds the best deal, save your money and time!

Here is how it works 
🔎  Leaptons automatically searches lowest prices across thousands of stores, when you are shopping online

🔔  If a lower price is found, Leaptons notifies you instantly in the browser

★   Just one click to share best deals with your friends through Facebook, Messenger, WhatsApp and WeChat

Leaptons supports hundreds of online stores like Amazon, Target, Walmart and more!

It’s 100% free!  Leaptons users save money, hundreds of dollars per month.


If you have any questions, please email us at help@leaptons.com, or visit website 
    https://www.leaptons.com/

By clicking “Add to Chrome” you agree to Leaptons Terms & Conditions: 
    https://www.leaptons.com/tos
long.zh_CN:
北美网购比价神器

浏览商品页面时，自动比较同款商品全网最低价，不再担心买贵。

核心功能
-- 全网自动比价，从30,000+网站中帮你找到最低价，不再担心买贵。
-- 在浏览商品页面时自动搜索全网最低价、自动识别虚假deal，购物安全省心有保障。
-- 支持上百家美国电商平台，包括亚马逊, 沃尔玛, Target, Sephora等.

免费下载安装

----
If you have any questions, please email us at help@leaptons.com, or visit website 
    https://www.leaptons.com/

By clicking “Add to Chrome” you agree to Leaptons Terms & Conditions: 
    https://www.leaptons.com/tos
